Docs.summary: A storage account definition allowing access tier to be set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.StorageAccount.Definition.IWithCreate WithAccessTier(valuetype Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.Models.AccessTier accessTier) cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies the access tier used for billing. Access tier cannot be changed more than once every 7 days (168 hours). Access tier cannot be set for StandardLRS, StandardGRS, StandardRAGRS, or PremiumLRS account types.
Docs.return: The next stage of storage account definition.
